targets.expr: avg((((avg(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate) by (container) / avg(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests) by (container)) * $cpu_weight) + ((avg(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", image!=""}) by (container) / avg(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests) by (container)) * $mem_weight)) / ($cpu_weight + $mem_weight))

(((avg(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate) by (container) / avg(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests) by (container)) * $cpu_weight) + ((avg(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", image!=""}) by (container) / avg(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests) by (container)) * $mem_weight)) / ($cpu_weight + $mem_weight)

panels.description: The value shows cpu requests to actual usage difference. Greater value means lower difference.
panels.title: CPU Requests efficiency

targets.expr: (avg(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /avg(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)) >0.019
